tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wrestling_merchandise_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE t_shirts (
    t_shirt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    t_shirt_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    t_shirt_size VARCHAR(10),
    t_shirt_color VARCHAR(50),
    t_shirt_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE t_shirts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    size VARCHAR(50),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE action_figures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    superhero_name VARCHAR(255),
    franchise VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE posters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    size VARCHAR(50),
    theme VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE
)
